name: The Legend of Freoland (Demo 1)
description:
The Legend of Freoland

Hi, there.

I was new to game development. So, I hope you will try this game and maybe donate.  This is just the first demo version. I will upload the second demo to. Anyway, in this game you will take a role as knight named Harold. You will lead your team to complete mission by the king in this demo. I think this game really need more development in the future. If you want to donate I very appreciate it.

Please tell or comment if you have any suggestion.
